Blog

Learn everything there is to know about Bitcoin

History

What is Bitcoin?

Bitcoin is a peer-to-peer electronic cash system proposed by software developer(s) Satoshi Nakamoto. A digital payment system which is the first decentralized digital currency aka cryptocurrency developed. It isn’t based on gold or silver, rather it is based on open source mathematical formulas.
